Module fi.tuni.swdesign.movienightplanner
Package fi.tuni.swdesign.movienightplanner.controllers

Class ShowDataController

java.lang.Object
fi.tuni.swdesign.movienightplanner.controllers.ShowDataController
public class ShowDataController extends Object
Handles all subtitle-related functionalities.
Author:
janii

  • Method Details

    • areFinnishSubtitlesAvailableAtAll

      public boolean areFinnishSubtitlesAvailableAtAll(int movieId)
      Checks if Finnish subtitles are available for a given movie from any service.
      Parameters:
      movieId - the ID of the movie to check for Finnish subtitles
      Returns:
      true if Finnish subtitles are available, false otherwise

    • areFinnishSubtitlesAvailableForMovieInService

      public boolean areFinnishSubtitlesAvailableForMovieInService(String streamingServiceName, int movieId)
      Checks if Finnish subtitles are available for a given movie on a specific streaming service.
      Parameters:
      streamingServiceName - the name of the streaming service to check
      movieId - the ID of the movie to check for Finnish subtitles
      Returns:
      true if Finnish subtitles are available on the specified streaming service, false otherwise

    • getServicesWithFinnishSubtitles

      public Set<String> getServicesWithFinnishSubtitles(int movieId)
      Fetches the list of streaming services that provide Finnish subtitles for a given movie.
      Parameters:
      movieId - the ID of the movie to check for Finnish subtitles
      Returns:
      a set of streaming service names that provide Finnish subtitles

    • isFinnishAreaSupported

      public boolean isFinnishAreaSupported(int movieId)
      Checks if Finnish area is supported for a given movie.
      Parameters:
      movieId - the ID of the movie to check for Finnish subtitle support
      Returns:
      true if Finnish subtitles are supported, false otherwise

    • checkRequiredSubtitlesForMovieInService

      public List<String> checkRequiredSubtitlesForMovieInService(int movieId, String streamingServiceName, List<String> languageList)
      Checks for the availability of required subtitles for a given movie on a specific streaming service.
      Parameters:
      movieId - the ID of the movie to check for subtitles
      streamingServiceName - the name of the streaming service to check
      languageList - the list of languages to check for subtitles
      Returns:
      a list of languages for which subtitles are available on the specified streaming service
